channel.title: Making npc say something
channel.description:
Can someone tell me where to put coding, and what code to put into the NPC Handler? This is a Devolution source, so I need it to work correctly. If someone can help with this, I would appreciate it, and you can have admin on my server.
Thanks,
Runer King

item.title: Making npc say something
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

yea open NPCHandler
ctrl+f find if (npcs[i].npcType ==
youll find
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1597) {
if (misc.random(100) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “You there! Do you dare enter the mage arena?”;
}
}
copy this, add it correctly, and replace the npcID and the text to your liking
so wherever the npc is in the WHOLE server, itll say what you entered for the text

Read full topic
